name: Jambb
introduce: Jambb is a digital comedy collectibles startup on a mission to serve collectors by unlocking the value of novel content and empowering users to own cultural moments with utility and exclusivity akin to physical collectibles. Jambb enables fans to acquire and share epic moments in the form of their favorite jokes, bits, sets, specials, and memorabilia, while allowing comedians to reach new types of fans, create additional revenue streams from their content, and benefit from open secondary markets.
